title: About Zetalvx Company
content: Zetalvx Company is a technology company specializing in artificial intelligence and robotics.

title: Zetalvx Company Headquarters
content: Zetalvx Company is headquartered in Italy, in the city of Milan.

title: Zetalvx Company Office Locations
content: Zetalvx Company has a total of 24 offices worldwide.

title: Working Hours at Zetalvx Company
content: The working hours at Zetalvx Company are from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM. The company does not operate on weekends.

title: Zetalvx Company Motto
content: The companyâ€™s motto is: 'Be the innovation you wish to see.'

title: Zetalvx Company ZetaQuarter Location
content: Zetalvx Company is precisely located in ZetaQuarter, a district in the city of Milan.

title: Foundation Year of Zetalvx Company
content: Zetalvx Company was founded in 1994, making it one of the early pioneers in AI and robotics within Italy.

title: Founder Profile
content: The founder of Zetalvx Company is currently 41 years old. The individual is recognized for innovative research in the field of AI.

title: Fast Food 'Da Pizza e Pizza' in Every Office
content: Each Zetalvx Company office worldwide houses a fast food restaurant called 'Da Pizza e Pizza', providing employees with quick and convenient meals.

title: Employee Count at Zetalvx Company
content: Zetalvx Company employs exactly 3500 people globally, out of which around 500 are based in the Redecesio office.

title: Primary Guidelines for Zetalvx Staff
content: The main company guideline mandates that employees always wear a mask, gloves, and yellow slippers while on duty, aiming to maintain a playful yet safe working environment.

title: Zetalvx Company Motto
content: The motto of the Zetalvx Company is 'Be the innovation you wish to see.'

title: Open Hours at Zetalvx Company
content: Zetalvx Company is open from 11:00 to 6:00 PM. The company in close in the weekends.

title: People Count at Zetalvx Company
content: Zetalvx Company has 3500 people globally working inside.
